mapper.select: SELECT vd.`video_likes`,li.`is_like`,ai.`is_attention`,p.`name` jobName FROM `video_display` vd LEFT JOIN `like_info` li ON vd.`video_id`=li.`video_id` LEFT JOIN `attention_info` ai ON ai.`user_id`=vd.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `post` p ON p.`post_id`=vd.`job_id` WHERE vd.`video_id`=#{videoId} and vd.`user_id`=#{userId}
